articles.author: Joey Lynch
articles.title: Son, Klinsmann embrace South Korea's 'zombie football' tag - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: After scoring an injury-time equaliser before triumphing in extra time of their Asian Cup quarterfinal against Australia, South Korea's play has been dubbed "Zombie Football" by their fans.
